name: Rocky Road
content: The highway lies between us
The things we said that we must
The raving disillusion of the things
We almost did but like the rocky road
That twists and turns
Where's end
Where is the ending of our song
The love you gave to me is so ture
I hope it lasts forever dear
Life is running short
Don't waste our tears
You are the one
I'll love in all my years
The moment when I need you
I think It's time I miss you
Feelings that are reside me
I know I can't live without you
The love you gave to me is so ture
I hope it lasts forever dear
Life is running short
Don't waste our tears
You are the one
I'll love in all my years
The love you gave to me is so ture
I hope it lasts forever dear
Life is running short
Don't waste our tears
You are the one
I'll love in all my years
